frontmatter.title: React Hooks Examples
frontmatter.description: Hooks are a new addition in React 16.8. They let you use state and other React features without writing a class.

frontmatter.title: Docker Wordpress with MariaDB
frontmatter.description: Docker builds images automatically by reading the instructions from a Dockerfile -- a text file that contains all commands, in order, needed to build a given image

frontmatter.title: Cleanup Node Modules recursively
frontmatter.description: A solution to delete all node_modules folders recursively from a specified path using the command line interface.

frontmatter.title: Files in a commit
frontmatter.description: git command that provides a formatted list of all of the commit given by a hash (SHA1), with no extraneous information.
